main.name: Anthony Hien Vu
main.description: Please scroll down to learn about me, my work experiences and my skills. You can also see and play with applications I've built and find out how to contact me if you would like to say hello or do some work together.
main.bio: I currently reside in Melbourne and have been working as a full-stack web developer at Telstra for almost a year now. I primarily use the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) stack when developing web applications. I also have experience developing web applications in python/django and ruby on rails, desktop applications in python and android apps in java. I am always learning and I enjoy watching and playing most sports, getting outdoors for hikes and running, building apps recreationally, and watching movies and TV shows.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
description: I am currently performing full-stack development of a Telstra enterprise web application with hundreds of internal users (utilizing the MERN stack of MongoDB, Express, React with Redux and Node). My primary purpose in this team has been building new business-critical features.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
